MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL11 postcode area of Wrexham, affecting properties in Victoria Gardens, Westminster Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:55am. Our engineers are on their way to the area to investigate the network and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 2pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:25am on 28th March 2021.
